sentence: Being a seasoned hotelier who has travelled the world to a certain extent staying at the Four Seasons Doha makes you realise how well they understand customer service
The service is also of a very high standard whether it is the bell boys room service polside service or in the restaurants
We arrived late at 12 am and the lady at the reception baha refused to make any discount and just make an upgrade for 1 room to a royal suit that was so frustrated from this hotel for 12 or 14 hours
The guy at the front desk I think he was named Fadi could not be bothered to look up from his screen and just mumbled “ sorry bout that ” before handing me the bill
Room food staff
Service was way better than other five star hotels where they over charge you even with a bottle of water and they give it to you very cold in an ice cooler for free
reception staf onlythe room smelled was like 2 star hotel
stayed there for two hours only paid full rate no upgrade to sea view room noise from street and airport traffic departures arrivals not friendly staff
Moments later there was a staff member at my door with a first aid kit alcohol prep pads iodine bandages and an offer to get me to a medical facility right then and there
Also I was disappointed that there are not any concierge in the hotel at night

I had lunch buffet today in elemants with friendsfrankly every thing was like wow food was delicious sweets were yummy service were so friendly welcoming and so activebesides the decoration is really greatwe had outdoors seats and this was so charming the atmosphere like a dream green all arounds birds singing beside you and the sea
This hotel has the high quality standards that the Four Seasons is known for combined with friendly and knowledgable staff throughout the property
The staff are uniformly friendly and welcoming and put you at ease
top notch facilities with super attentive services
Thanks to Stefania and Cristina in the reception
I would highly recommend the classes at Four Seasons its a great facility too staff in reception are lovely too you feel very welcome every time
Wonderful hotel good service
Every detail is attended to by well trained and friendly immigrant staff
Perfect service great facilities wonderful hotel
This is simply the best hotel team we have ever had the pleasure of meeting
